thread.title: Kristen Stewart is the latest celebrity to join in Mario Testino's Instagram towel series - Showbiz
thread.title_full: Kristen Stewart is the latest celebrity to join in Mario Testino's Instagram towel series - Showbiz News - Digital Spy

author: Ian Sandwell
title: Kristen Stewart is the latest celebrity to join in Mario Testino's Instagram towel series - Showbiz
text: Kristen Stewart has become the latest celebrity to pose in nothing but a towel for renowned fashion photographer Mario Testino.The 25-year-old actress looks stunning as she drapes a towel over her shoulder in the intimate black and white image. TOWEL SERIES 91, KRISTEN STEWART. #MarioTestino #TowelSeriesA photo posted by MARIO TESTINO (@mariotestino) on Oct 17, 2015 at 8:14am PDTStewart's portrait is the 91st in the photographer's provocative sequence of images, which he shares on his Instagram page.He describes them on his website as a liberating experience: "I think guys and girls feel this freedom at being able to express themselves because there is no predetermined way of how they should put the towel on."You can do anything you want.... Wear it however you want."He added that they were originally inspired by Kate Moss after he once spied the supermodel wrapped in several towels on the set of a photoshoot.The Twilight star follows in the footsteps of Selena Gomez, Blake Lively, Justin Bieber and Alex Pettyfer in posing for the series.See a selection of the images below: TOWEL SERIES 73, SELENA GOMEZ. #MarioTestino #TowelSeries @SelenaGomezA photo posted by MARIO TESTINO (@mariotestino) on Apr 19, 2015 at 9:54am PDT TOWEL SERIES 72, BLAKE LIVELY. #MarioTestino #TowelSeries @BlakeLivelyA photo posted by MARIO TESTINO (@mariotestino) on Apr 13, 2015 at 2:35pm PDT TOWEL SERIES 70A, JUSTIN BIEBER. #MarioTestino #TowelSeries @JustinBieber @VogueMagazineA photo posted by MARIO TESTINO (@mariotestino) on Mar 24, 2015 at 2:56pm PDT TOWEL SERIES 88, ALEX PETTYFER. #MarioTestino #TowelSeries @alexpettyferA photo posted by MARIO TESTINO (@mariotestino) on Sep 13, 2015 at 11:10am PDT
